name: Galaxy Earrings
description:
Solid sterling silver hook and chain earrings with smokey amethyst Brandberg crystal drops .

From hook end to bottom of ring 35mm. Finished length will depend on crystal size.

Each crystal is unique and individual so no two earring pairs will be alike. While all care has been taken to choose crystals that are roughly the same size some will be bigger and smaller than others.

Each pair comes packaged in a branded Lost Revolution leather pouch.

BRANDBERG CRYSTALS
The Brandberg Mountain lies in Namibia in southern Africa. This mountain is sacred to the tribal people. Brandberg crystals are rare due to their combinations of amethyst and smokey quartz phantoms, water bubbles and lepidolite inclusions.
These crystals are thought to assist in deep healing and cleansing and can also help restore vitality.

name: Celestial Ring
description:
Solid sterling silver ring with oxidised texture. Set with Onyx cabochons and a Herkimer diamond on each side.

Inside ring diameter 18mm.

As every crystal is unique and individual no two rings will be alike.

Each comes packaged in a branded Lost Revolution leather pouch.

ONYX
Onyx could help to enhance determination and setting ones mind to a task. It is a grounding stone and can be used to deflect or absorb the negativity of others and in that way is a good stone for protection from negative forces and influences.

HERKIMER DIAMONDS
True Herkimer Diamonds are found only in Herkimer NY They are very powerful stones because they are double terminated. As a type of clear quartz, Herkimers can enhance dream recall and help to raise energy levels.

name: Globes Bangle
description:
Solid sterling silver bangle that spins on axis points. Each point is set with an amethyst cabochon. Each silver band has oxidised texture on the outside.

Inner bangle ring diameter 6.8cm.

Each comes packaged in a branded Lost Revolution leather pouch.

AMETHYST
Amethyst is a stone of the mind. It helps to bring calmness and clarity where there is anxiety and confusion. Its thought to be very good for overworked, overstressed or overwhelmed mental states because of its extreme calming mental effects. Amethyst is also a crystal of protection because it repels more than it attracts.

name: Galaxy Necklace
description:
Solid sterling silver necklace with smokey amethyst Brandberg crystal pendant set with a black diamond.

Chain length is 40cm. Finished length will vary depending on crystal size.

Each crystal is unique and individual so no two necklaces will be alike. While all care has been taken to choose crystals that are roughly the same size some will be bigger and smaller than others.

Each comes packaged in a branded Lost Revolution leather pouch.

BRANDBERG CRYSTALS
The Brandberg Mountain lies in Namibia in southern Africa. This mountain is sacred to the tribal people. Brandberg crystals are rare due to their combinations of amethyst and smokey quartz phantoms, water bubbles or lepidolite inclusions.
These crystals are thought to assist in deep healing and cleansing and can also help restore vitality.
